banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: In defense of extroverts

nodes.whoTheyAre: Whether you are an introvert or extrovert, diverse personalities are often a company’s biggest asset. But sometimes at work there's a struggle to balance personality with “executive presence.” Katherine Lucas is looking at solutions. Head of Marketing for North America at State Street, Lucas works closely with clients and internal teams to understand their challenges and provide direction for marketing programs.

videoData.description: Katherine Lucas is an extrovert — but to her surprise, her cheerful smiles and warm approach gave others the impression that she was less intelligent and lacked leadership skills. Lucas identifies different types of extroverts and argues that the workplace needs them all.
videoData.socialDescription: Katherine Lucas is an extrovert — but to her surprise, her cheerful smiles and warm approach gave others the impression that she was less intelligent and lacked leadership skills. Lucas identifies different types of extroverts and argues that the workplace needs them all.
